briefTitle: Tapinarof for the Treatment of Plaque Psoriasis in Adults (3002)
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Efficacy and Safety Study of Tapinarof for the Treatment of Plaque Psoriasis in Adults
summary: This is a randomized double-blind vehicle-controlled Phase 3 study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of topical tapinarof cream, 1% once daily for the treatment of plaque psoriasis in adults. Approximately 500 adult subjects with plaque psoriasis will be randomized 2:1 to receive either tapinarof cream, 1% or matching vehicle cream once daily for 12 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of Subjects Who Achieve a Physician Global Assessment (PGA) Score of Clear (0) or Almost Clear (1) With a Minimum 2-grade Improvement From Baseline at Week 12. Analyses Were Done Using Multiple Imputation
